name: Johan-the-ripper
tagline: ripping mp3 off the video file, supposedly
body:
this project is my own video converter using ffmpeg.
the program will use ffmpeg to convert the videos chosen to either video or audio files.

Conversion format:

C:\Program Files\ffmpeg>ffmpeg -i "D:\v\Within Temptation - Memories.mp4" -b 500k -ab 128k -vcodec mpeg4 -s 320x240 -acodec libfaac D:\v\WI-Memories.mp4
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
